Test Steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/courier with valid body
Send POST request without login fields
Send POST request without password fields
Send POST request without firstName fields

Precondition:
A courier account is already created successfully 
with a unique login (e.g., login: "ninja")
Test Steps:
Send POST request with the same login value 
used in the precondition

Precondition:
- Create a courier with POST /api/v1/courier.
-Retrieve the courier’s id using POST /api/v1/courier/login.
Test Steps:
Send DELETE request to /api/v1/courier/:id with 
the retrieved valid id

Precondition: Ensure the requested id does not belong to any existing courier.
Test Steps: Send DELETE request with a non-existent id

Test Case: DELETE /api/v1/courier/:id – Verify courier is actually deleted
Precondition:
- Create a courier with POST /api/v1/courier.
- Retrieve courier id via POST /api/v1/courier/login.
- Delete courier with DELETE /api/v1/courier/:id.
Test Steps:
After successful DELETE, 
send another DELETE /api/v1/courier/:id 
with the same id.
